name: password_knighth
author: Ohtufox
description: Security add-on that protects user's passswords by giving them information about the safety of their password field data.

preferences.name: passwordPeek
preferences.title: Password peek is enabled
preferences.description: While enabled, on the safe password fields an icon appears that allows you to peek your password.

preferences.name: SSLRedirect
preferences.title: SSL redirect is enabled
preferences.description: While enabled, if secure version of unsecure page exists, you are redirected to it

preferences.name: disableUndetermined
preferences.title: Disable icons if target is undetermined
preferences.description: Do not show any icons if form target cannot be determined

preferences.name: theme
preferences.title: Theme
preferences.description: Choose a theme for the addon.
